title.narrative: IR 3.1 CAPACITY BUILDING OF THE WATER

description.narrative: 3.1 By 2014, PWA and CMWU databases and Water Information System (WIS) are fully established and Water, Sanitation, and Hygiene (WASH) Cluster database is fully integrated with PWA database and information systems., which contributes to Sanitation, Wash And Emergencies, Water. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Evaluations, Research And Data, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: Outcome 3: By 2014, households in vulnerable communities and 165 Schools have increased access to safe water and sanitation, and State of Palestine emergency planning and response mechanisms are effective.
